channel.title: CVE Feed for Essential Plugin -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Essential Plugin -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-47307|2024-10-06T11:31:27.068Z -- essential%20plugin -- meta%20slider%20and%20carousel%20with%20lightbox
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Essential Plugin Meta slider and carousel with lightbox allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Meta slider and carousel with lightbox: from n/a through 2.0.1.
